reviewText: We Love using What's in The Bible with our Wednesday night children's group.  All of the kids seem to really like it.  My only disappointment is that we did not receive the code, again because it happened when we ordered #3 also, that allows us to pull up the curriculum online.
We bought the entire set for our church Children's Ministry and love them all. They teach the kids so much about the Bible the adults get something out of it too. Keeps them engaged and excited.
